History.prompt: What is the history of the species?

Evolution.prompt:
How old is your species?
Do they have common ancestors? If so, are they extinct? Are they equal in development? 
Where on the planet did your species originate?
Was there any outside influence to their evolution?
Were they divinely created?

Migration.prompt:
Does your species migrate across the planet? If so, what determines this migration? Is migration Seasonal, Cultural, Spiritual?
Are they Sedentary (Stay in one place)?

Physiology.prompt: What does this species look like? Any outstanding characteristics?

Body Characteristics.prompt:
Does your species have opposable thumbs?
What is their average height and weight?
How many arm/legs does your species have?
Do they have multiple jointed limbs?
Do they have tails, claws, mandibles, wings, etc?
What are the common colours of their eyes, hair, skin, etc?
How do they move? (walk, slither, jump, etc)

Physical Capabilities.prompt:
Does your species body allow for enhanced abilities? Climbing, flying, swimming, etc?
Are they Telepathic/Telekinetic?
Are they very strong? Can they move fast? Can they jump extremely high?
If they have a tail, is it prehensile?

Physical Limitations.prompt:
Does your species struggle with particular physical activities?
Is their bone structure weak/fragile?
Does the shape/function of their hands affect their ability to grasp objects?
Does the shape of their mouths make it difficult to eat, or drink fluids?
Are certain body parts too large, small, heavy, etc, to be comfortable?

Intelligence.prompt: Are they intelligent? What behaviours show it? Are they self-aware? Do they use tools? Communicate? Socialize?

Sleeping.prompt: Do they sleep? How often and for how long (generally)? Are they diurnal, noctural, ...?

Biological Characteristics.prompt:
What colour is your species' blood? 
How does their DNA determine their physical characteristics?
Is there Sexual Dimorphism?
How old can your species get? Are they Immortal?
Do they have some form of natural camouflage? Can they control their pigmentation?
Is there biological variation? (blood type, genetic diseases, cranial features, facial features, organ systems, eye color, hair color and texture, height and build, and skin color)

Diet and Nutrition.prompt:
What does your species eat? Are they Herbivores, Carnivores, or Omnivores?
Are they Cannibalistic?
Is there a particular food substance that is harmful/deadly to them?
What is their average daily calorie intake?

Disease and Immune System.prompt:
Are there any viruses or pathogens that plague the world?
Are they more or less prone to disease?
Do they have any inherited immunities?
How strong is your species' Immune system? Do they even have one?
Are they carriers of a disease that can affect other species?
How are diseases treated? Do they have/use medicine?
Do they understand gemmology?
Can they have some form of animal or plant based allergies?

Reproduction.prompt:
How many genders exist?
How do your species procreate?
Does your species rely on Egg & Sperm cells? Or use other methods of impregnation?
How long does pregnancy last?
How does your species give birth? Live young , Egg laying, Pupa Larvae?

Playing.prompt: How important is playing? Is it generally practiced? Only by young individuals?

Threats.prompt: Are there any threats towards this species? Which and by whom or what?

Uses.prompt: Is this species used for a given purpose? Food, Transportation, Warfare, Agriculture, Industry, Medicine, ...?

Subspecies & Types.prompt: Are there subspecies? Which and how do they differ?

Hybrids.prompt: Are there hybrids? With whom and what are the results?
